title: FACT CHECK: Has Priyanka Chopra joined RSS? - Times of India
subtitle: News News: A photo of actress Priyanka Chopra wearing khaki pleated shorts is being shared with the claim that she has joined the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RS
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim: A photo of actress Priyanka Chopra wearing khaki pleated shorts is being shared with the claim that she has joined the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS).The claim is being made by many on Facebook. Incidentally, the most viral ones have been made on the group ‘WE SUPPORT NARENDRA MODI ’.Claim Exhibit 2 Few Facebook users also created posts making the claim on their own profile No, Priyanka Chopra has not joined RSS.Seeing Chopra wearing khaki shorts, many Twitter users joked that she has joined RSS, for khaki shorts have been RSS members’ trademark attire for over nine decades.Like many jokes/memes that are later shared as news, many social media users decided to share this photo of Chopra without making it obvious that it’s a joke. And many fell for it.A reverse-image search on Google showed that Chopra was clicked wearing this outfit earlier this week when she stepped out with husband Nick Jonas in New York city Times Now reported about it on June 17 and Times of India reported how she was trolled post that.Times Fact Check has found the claim that Priyanka Chopra joined RSS began as a joke and was later shared by many social media users as news.
